title: Help Page Should Always Load in Its Own Panel Tab
author: jcefoli
body_snippet:
When opening the help page, it is possible to get into a situation where it is impossible to close it when Options --> Tabs & Panels --> "Always show Panel Tabs" is unchecked (workaround is to open a connection). That option should only apply to connections, not the help page. 

Steps to reproduce:

1. Launch mRemoteNG
1. In Options --> Tabs & Panels --> Make sure "Always show Panel Tabs" is unchecked
1. Do not open any connections
1. Open Help Dialog (from F1 or Menu)

comments.author: farosch
comments.snippet:
You're absolutely right @jcefoli 
This is something that has been bothering me, too.
I'll look into this, having a check surrounding that settings which will make it only valid for Windows of a specific window type.

comments.author: farosch
comments.snippet:
TBH I have no idea why we have that setting anyways.
It just makes things complicated and no other software I know of has that feature where it hides tabs when there is only one of them open.
Looks like someone had been implementing this feature at the request of an individual. I can't believe this is actually something a reasonable percentage of users would want.
So I'd be in absolute favor of removing this feature completely...

comments.author: nmat
comments.snippet: The only one app I know that does this is total commander. but otherwise no other.
